summary: I set up a new, no-pressure podcast where I talk about random things
title: Audio Weeknotes

summary:
A contradictory title from someone who lives in a country that is among the world's largest coffee consumers, and who loves a Swedish fika. 
The title, of course, refers to the "Buy Me a Coffee" buttons that you see on every other blog.  Today, it's often easier to find a donation button than a link to the RSS feed or a contact page...
title: Don't buy me a coffee... yet

summary: For those who don’t know, Kirkus is one of the major publishing trade magazines, and a starred review means that they are holding out your book as one of special note.  And guess what.  Kirkus gave When the Moon Hits Your Eye a starred review...
title: When the Moon Hits Your Eye Gets a Starred Review in Kirkus

summary: Exploring the charm of living in video game worlds like Theme Park World and GTA's Vice City and San Andreas
title: The Video Game Worlds I’d Love to Live In
